Raypower bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ redio Naijiria nwere onwe ha na-agbasa ozi n'ọtụtụ obodo na mba niile, gụnyere na 100.5 FM frequency site na Abuja na Lagos Steeti.
N'ihi mwepụ nke mgbasa ozi na 24 ọgọọst 1992, DAAR Communications Plc, nke Raymond Dokpesi guzobere, tinyere akwụkwọ ma nye ya ikike iji rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ redio kwụụrụ onwe ya

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke malitere ịnwale nnyefe na 15 Disemba 1993 mere akụkọ ihe mere eme na 1 Septemba 1994 mgbe ọ malitere mgbasa ozi azụmahịa site na mmalite nke Raypower 100.5 fm na Lagos dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi awa iri abụọ na anọ nke mbụ na Naịjirịa yana ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa akụkọ onwe onye mbụ na mba ahụ
A malitere ụlọ ọrụ Abuja na 1 Jenụwarị afọ 2005.

Na Jụn afọ 2019, National Broadcasting Commission mechiri Raypower na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nwanne ya nwanyị, Africa Independent Television; Dokpesi, onye mmegide, kwuru na a na-elekwasị anya na ụlọ ọrụ ya ma na-ekwu na ụgwọ ikikere dị oke elu. Kọmitii ahụ kwuru na ọ manyere ha imechi ruo mgbe ebighi ebi n'ihi mmebi nke koodu mgbasa ozi na enweghị ike izute ọrụ ndị ọzọ nye onye nchịkwa
Ọ wepụrụ ọkwa nkwụsị na ngwụcha ọnwa ahụ.
